prompt: Highlight a species known for its extraordinary ability to drink 50 gallons of water in one day.
icl_complete: A species known for its extraordinary ability to drink large amounts of water is the giraffe. Giraffes, inhabiting the African savannah, have been observed to drink up to 10 gallons of water at a time, but certain large animals, like some species of whales, can drink even more water, especially when considering their intake through both drinking and their food.
